items: Telematics & computer engineers for luxury yachts

hero.title: We craft resilient technology ecosystems for yachts that demand safety and comfort at sea.
hero.description: We are telematics and computer engineers. Founded in 2024, we have already delivered our first end-to-end project featuring Starlink connectivity, secure networks and bespoke AV automation. We design, integrate and support every detail as if we were sailing with you.

features.label: Certified team
features.detail: Specialists in satellite communications, secure networking and onboard automation.

features.label: Founder-led delivery
features.detail: Direct involvement of the founders across planning, installation and long-term support.

features.label: Resilient architectures
features.detail: Automatic failover networks, proactive cybersecurity and remote monitoring.

plan.title: Our commitment
plan.description: Full lifecycle partnership: audit, execution and remote support to keep your vessel always connected.

stats.label: Telematics + computer science with a marine focus

solutions.title: Next-generation marine engineering for ambitious new projects
solutions.description: Netnautica was born to elevate luxury yacht technology with a boutique mindset. From Palma de Mallorca we partner with captains, shipyards and owners in every international marina.
highlights: Experience in critical networks and cybersecurity
Installations personally supervised by the founders

items.title: Specialist engineers
items.description: Telematics and computer science backgrounds with certifications in networking, satellite and marine electronics.

items.title: Extreme integration
items.description: We combine connectivity, cybersecurity, AV, IoT and NMEA 2000 monitoring in a single coherent ecosystem.

items.title: Long-term partners
items.description: Remote follow-up, scheduled audits and preventive support so the crew can sail with confidence.

services.title: Solutions that balance comfort, security and global connectivity
services.description: Click each service to discover how we deploy it on board your yacht.

items.title: Worldwide Connectivity
items.subtitle: Yacht connectivity systems
items.summary: Multi-WAN architecture with Starlink, 4G/5G and optimised WiFi 6 networks for large vessels.
items.headline: Global Coverage
items.subheadline: Stay connected anywhere in the world
features: Infrastructure to support multiple internet connections with automatic failover
Starlink LEO constellation and 4G/5G cellular communication systems
Optimized WiFi networks for maximum onboard comfort and performance
Advanced QoS management for priority applications

items.title: Cybersecurity
items.subtitle: Yacht cybersecurity systems
items.summary: Robust digital perimeters with next-gen firewalls, segmentation and ongoing monitoring.
items.headline: Digital Fortress at Sea
items.subheadline: Protection for your connected yacht ecosystem
features: IoT device security and firmware update management

items.title: AV System Integration
items.subtitle: Yacht AV entertainment systems
items.summary: Tailored audiovisual experiences with centralised control and venue-specific acoustics.
items.headline: Cinematic Experience at Sea
items.subheadline: AV systems for ultimate luxury entertainment
features: Multi-room video distribution with 4K matrix switching
Conference and presentation systems for business meetings
Distributed audio system with zone control

items.title: IoT & Video Surveillance Systems
items.subtitle: Yacht IoT automation systems
items.summary: Automation, intelligent lighting and centralised surveillance with secure remote access.
items.headline: Intelligent Control & Security
items.subheadline: Advanced automation with comprehensive video monitoring
features: Guest cabin personalization with individual environment controls
Remote surveillance access via mobile applications and web portals
Real-time streaming capabilities for multiple viewing stations

technologies.title: We deploy brands that set the onboard benchmark
technologies.description: Hardware and software carefully curated to deliver resilience, performance and security on every crossing.

items.name: Starlink
items.description: Flat High Performance antennas with remote management and maritime-optimised plans.

items.name: Ubiquiti UniFi
items.description: Controller-driven access points for seamless coverage across every deck.

items.name: Peplink
items.description: Dynamic load balancing, SD-WAN orchestration and cloud monitoring for satellite + 4G/5G setups.

items.name: Fortinet
items.description: Next-generation firewalls, Zero Trust policies and managed services to shield every onboard device.

items.name: Crestron
items.description: Tailored interfaces, smart scenes and integration with hotel-style entertainment.

items.name: NMEA 2000
items.description: Real-time telemetry and critical data monitoring for a truly connected bridge.

partners.description: From Palma de Mallorca we coordinate deployments to the Balearics, Barcelona, the C√¥te d'Azur and any international marina along your itinerary.

items.title: 24/7 remote support
items.description: Proactive monitoring, guided troubleshooting and crew coordination to minimise downtime.

items.title: Tailored technical visits
items.description: Scheduled interventions and full audits ahead of crossings or crew rotations.

items.title: Expert network
items.description: Collaboration with certified shipyards, electrical installers and marine automation specialists.
